page.title: 06Customs - Harvest Fair
page.content: There are two fairs which are important to our area: Harvest Fair and Wendron Ram Buck Fair. {Harvest Fair} is held on the first Monday in September and is when farmers bring in hay, straw, corn and barley from the feilds. They go in to Helston to a special fair. People enjoy having a go on all the rides at the fun fair which follows the Agricultural Show. There are competions of handicrafts, cookery, vegetables, arts & crafts, flower arranging, photography and other rural hobbies. These are open to adults and children and the competition is often very fierce!
